official-title.#text:
To require the Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to create an
			 electronic database of research and information on the causes of, and
			 corrective actions being taken with regard to, algal blooms in the Great
			 Lakes, their tributaries, and other surface fresh waters, and for other
			 purposes.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on
committee-name.#text: Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

committee-name.#tail:
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such
			 provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Great Lakes and Fresh Water Algal Bloom Information Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Great Lakes and Fresh Water Algal Bloom Information Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Great Lakes algal blooms information database

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall create an electronic
			 database of research and information on the causes and corrective actions
			 being taken with regard to algal blooms in the Great Lakes, their
			 tributaries, and other surface fresh waters.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall include in the database relevant chemical, physical, and biological data
			 that have been collected by an accredited university, association or
			 organization, research group, Federal agency, State, or local government
			 in the United States or Canada.

shall protect
			 confidentiality of information in accordance with all applicable United
			 States laws and regulations.

text.#text: In creating and making information available through the database, the

header.#text: Annual report and availability of information

text.#text:
report to the Congress each year comprehensive findings on information that was included in the
			 database in the year covered by the report, including information
			 regarding corrective actions being taken; and
make information in the database electronically available to the public.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, including any
			 authority to require submission of data.

text.#text: This section shall not be construed to grant any authority to the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5456 IH: Great Lakes and Fresh Water Algal Bloom Information Act

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
